thread.title: South African Airways announces 2015 Summer Sale
thread.title_full: South African Airways announces 2015 Summer Sale

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: South African Airways announces 2015 Summer Sale
text:
South African Airways announces 2015 Summer Sale South African Airways announces 2015 Summer Sale Details   15:00 Great value fares from London to Johannesburg, Cape Town, Windhoek and more South African Airways is offering discounted year-round fares from London to eight of Africa’s most fantastic cities including: South Africa’s Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban and Port Elizabeth; Mozambique’s Maputo; Namibia’s Windhoek; Zambia’s Livingstone and Zimbabwe’s Victoria Falls. 
With discounted fares available as early as 2nd September 2015 through to 19th June 2016, travellers can save up to £258 on a typical fare and up to £1,085 on a business class fare. Travellers can purchase discounted Economy Class fares for travel between 2nd September to 3rd December 2015, 5th January to 23rd March 2016 and 5th April to 23rd June 2016. Travellers can purchase discounted Business Class fares from 2nd September 2015 to 19th June 2016. The national carrier for South Africa, South African Airways offers double daily flights to Johannesburg from London Heathrow’s newest Terminal 2, and onward connections through the largest route network within Southern Africa.
